table.name: admin_user_amount_log
table.Comment: 平台管理员账户变动日志表

column.name: novel_recommend
column.Comment: 是否开启定制书籍推荐

column.name: novel_like
column.Comment: 是否开启猜你喜欢的书籍

column.name: type
column.Comment: 类型（0 为充值，1为消费）

column.name: is_push
column.Comment: 是否已推送过公众号信息

column.name: payment_no
column.Comment: 代付成功后，返回的内部业务单号

column.name: type
column.Comment: 类型（0 为使用书币，1为充值书币

column.name: novel_id
column.Comment: 用户阅读消费书币的小说id

column.name: chapter_id
column.Comment: 用户阅读消费书币的章节id
